column4: Outbound right lane blocked just past Clays Mill Rd following a structure fire.
Expect continued delays on S Broadway and Harrodsburg Rd during the overnight as a fire truck remains on scene.

column3: Trans-Siberian Orchestra at Rupp Arena at 7:30 p.m.:
column4: Use added caution if traveling downtown this evening and watch for pedestrians.
